validations.description: Employee ID must be provided and cannot be spaces.
validations.failureOutcome: Display error message and skip further processing for the record.

validations.description: Gross pay must not be less than zero.
validations.failureOutcome: Display error and reject record for payroll calculation.

validations.description: Tax code must be one of A, B, or C.
validations.condition: IF TAX-CODE NOT = A AND TAX-CODE NOT = B AND TAX-CODE NOT = C
validations.failureOutcome: Display error and stop payroll processing for the record.

validations.description: Date of birth must not be in the future.
validations.failureOutcome: Display error and reject new employee entry.
Display error and prevent new employee onboarding.

validations.description: Benefits type must be a valid code: MED, DEN, VIS.
validations.condition: IF BENEFITS-TYPE NOT = MED AND BENEFITS-TYPE NOT = DEN AND BENEFITS-TYPE NOT = VIS
validations.failureOutcome: Display error and skip benefit enrollment.
